name: Cheers: the Game
description:
Meet in the middle and toast to Bar SK, but don't "cheers" an empty glass!

Controls:

P1: "A" to jump, "S" to move forward

P2: "L" to jump, "K" to move forward

Hold "A", "S", "K", and "L" simultaneously to reset after you cheers or if you get stuck. Or press "Space" if your device can't handle four simultaneous key presses.

Update: Both Windows and Mac builds work now!
